import React, { useState } from "react"; import { MDBContainer, MDBNavbar, MDBBtn, MDBIcon, MDBDropdown, MDBDropdownToggle, MDBDropdownMenu, MDBDropdownItem, MDBDropdownLink, MDBDropdownDivider, } from "mdb-react-ui-kit"; export default function TopNavigation() { const username = localStorage.getItem("username"); const company = localStorage.getItem("company"); const logout = () => { localStorage.removeItem("username"); localStorage.removeItem("company"); localStorage.removeItem("refresh_token"); localStorage.removeItem("access_token"); alert("Sie werden ausgeloggt."); window.location.reload(false); }; return ( <>

); }
